amendment.description: To provide for additional places of holding court, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4072 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4072 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR 11/20/2004 S11662; text: CR 11/20/2004 S11662) To provide for additional places of holding court, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4072 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Leahy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4072 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
